ygData.subject: Petition about faction hit
ygData.msgSnippet: I think that we should petition about our hit list.  We should not be hated by every agressive npc that we meet.  For example, i would be standing healing
ygData.messageBody:
I think that we should petition about our hit list. We should not be hated
by every agressive npc that we meet. For example, i would be standing
healing myself then suddenly these Orc's warriors from all the way from the
distance would rush up and beat me to a pulp. or when they would not attack
the nearest pc but would travel the extra distance just to attack u.
Another rant is we would get a faction hit for doing nothing at all except
being near the MOB's death. Don't you all think this is very annoying.

Your Friendly Rogue and Bard
Hammerpaw and Samiam
Champions of Norrath, The Rathe
